name: Codognotto Italia S.p.A.
goal:
The Codognotto brand has been well known since the first company of the Codognotto family was founded after
the second world war. In 1975 its place was taken by the current Holding of the group founded by the six
Codognotto brothers. The beginning of their staggering growth is more recent though, starting in the midst of the
economic crisis. While a number of companies were closing down, the Group started internationalizing by
investing in infrastructure, technologies and human resources. As described by the International Transport Journal
“today the group is seen as one of the leaders of the industry, showing incredible strength when faced with new
challenges”. The interest in the company is due to its growing rate in the last years which is around 15%.
Nowadays, Codognotto Group has a turnover of 200 M (160M transport and logistics while 40M manufactures).
It has more than 5,000 customers, 3,500 deliveries per week and 950 employees.
Among its fleet it can count 1,500 semitrailers and 600 trucks. Furthermore, it is able to manage all modes of
transport operating with different BUs.
